channel.title: Sports
channel.description:
Denny Hamlin didn’t show much emotion as he talked about how another title slipped away.
The way he lost the 2025 title resulted in more shock and disbelief rather than sadness. And that’s saying something, considering he had seemingly lost championships in every way possible. "I really don't have much for emotion right now," Hamlin said. "I’m just numb about it because I'm just in shock. That's about it." But by losing a comfortable lead with less than three laps remaining when the caution came out for a William Byron flat tire and ensuing crash Sunday at Phoenix Raceway, Hamlin seemed in disbelief.

item.title: Denny Hamlin 'In Shock' After Elusive Cup Title Slips Through Fingertips
item.description: It was heartbreak for Denny Hamlin at Phoenix, and at the moment, he never wants to race a car ever again.
